Html:
Hi
I'm very much a newbie to working with WPF and Visual Studio 2010, and can't figure out how to get started with the WPFTookit.  I've run the .msi install without problems, and created references to WPFToolkit, WPFToolkit.Design and WPFToolkit.VisualStudio.Design for a new WPF application. I've also reset the Toolbox. Yet I still can't see the Chart control (all I want to do is build a simple line chart....)
